title: Wenje Social Network
details: Responsive social network web app. Users can sign up or sign in, add posts, images (upload to Cloudinary), and comments, like/unlike posts, follow/unfollow other users, search users by name and edit user profile.

title: MeWays Static Website
details: Responsive modern Website for a fictitious digital agency showcasing their services and previous work.

title: ARNCODE
details: My personal responsive website to show my portfolio, provide contact details and a contact form to send messages directly to my email.
